AllCommands.levelCommands: `rank` - get the rank of yourself or a specific user.%n + `leaderboard` - get the highest ranking users in the guild.%n + `rank-total` - get the total amount of xp of yourself or another user.%n + `rank-settings` - rankup and rank boost settings for moderators. (admin)%n + `rank-role` - assign rank roles for users when they level up. (admin)%n + `rank-roles` - get a list of current rank roles.
AllCommands.utilCommands: `help [command]` - get help for a specific command.%n + `prefix <prefix>` - set this guilds prefix. (admin)%n + `status` - get the status and statistics of the bot.%n + `shop` - shop items (not fully implemented).%n + `timestamp` - get the timestamp of a Discord snowflake.%n + `uptime` - get the uptime of the bot.%n + `info` - get info about the server or a specific user.%n + `avatar` - get the avatar of yourself or another user.%n + `bug-report` - report a bug directly to me.%n
AllCommands.moderationCommands: `log-channel` - set the logging channel. (admin)%n `add-log` - add a log type to the log channel. (admin)%n `remove-log` - remove a log type from the channel. (admin)%n `log-types` - list all current log types.%n `get-log` - list what's being logged.%n
